properties.name: Mitte
properties.culture: Historic heart of Berlin with museums, galleries, and government buildings.
properties.things_to_do: Explore Museum Island, stroll Unter den Linden, visit Brandenburg Gate.
properties.history: Former center of East Berlin, home to significant historical sites from Prussian to Cold War era.
properties.why_visit: Combines iconic landmarks with modern cultural venues.
properties.best_time: Morning to midday when sites are less crowded.

properties.name: Kreuzberg
properties.culture: Bohemian and multicultural, known for street art and alternative vibe.
properties.things_to_do: Walk along the East Side Gallery, sample international cuisine, enjoy nightlife on Oranienstraße.
properties.history: Once a walled-in enclave during the Cold War, now symbol of counterculture.
properties.why_visit: Experience Berlin's creative energy and diverse food scene.
properties.best_time: Evening for vibrant bars and restaurants.

properties.name: Prenzlauer Berg
properties.culture: Charming neighborhood with cafes, boutiques, and restored pre-war buildings.
properties.things_to_do: Relax in Mauerpark, visit the Kulturbrauerei, browse weekend markets.
properties.history: From working-class district to gentrified hotspot after reunification.
properties.why_visit: Laid-back atmosphere, family-friendly, mix of old and new Berlin.
properties.best_time: Weekend afternoons for markets and park life.

properties.name: Charlottenburg
properties.culture: Upscale district famed for its royal heritage and shopping avenues.
properties.things_to_do: Tour Charlottenburg Palace, browse Kurfürstendamm's stores, visit the Kaiser Wilhelm Memorial Church.
properties.history: Former royal borough and later the commercial center of West Berlin.
properties.why_visit: Combines baroque architecture with high-end dining and retail.
properties.best_time: Afternoon for palace tours and evening for dining.

properties.name: Friedrichshain
properties.culture: Youthful and edgy area known for nightlife and street art.
properties.things_to_do: Hang out at Boxhagener Platz, explore RAW-Gelände, see the East Side Gallery.
properties.history: Once an industrial quarter, rejuvenated after reunification into a creative hub.
properties.why_visit: Alternative culture, clubs, and vibrant weekend markets.
properties.best_time: Late nights for clubs or weekend mornings for markets.

properties.name: Neukölln
properties.culture: Diverse and rapidly changing neighborhood with a thriving creative scene.
properties.things_to_do: Stroll along the Landwehr Canal, relax in Körnerpark, enjoy bars on Weserstraße.
properties.history: Historically working-class and immigrant area now experiencing gentrification.
properties.why_visit: Mix of cultures, street food, and nightlife.
properties.best_time: Evenings for the lively bar and restaurant scene.
